items.title: What fast food selection would you like to see at Notre Dame Stadium?
items.summary: I don’t get to sit inside the stadium very often for home Notre Dame Football games. My duties for OFD inside the press box trump my need to wear a cutoff shirt while drunkenly screaming LFG (sadly), but as a family (and apparently this means girlfriends/boyfriends too) we have been planning at least ONE home […]

items.title: Six Notre Dame football players are invited to the NFL Combine
items.summary: With the Super Bowl over, all eyes in the football world are focused on the NFL Draft and the long process to get there. One of the rites of passage is the NFL Combine — a rite of passage that is becoming more and more obsolete for many top prospects each year. We keep seeing […]

items.title: Will Notre Dame meet expectations this season?
items.summary: It’s a long off-season, and that means there will be plenty of trolls, hacks, haters, and randoms that will choose to wake up one day and crap in the breakfast bowls of Notre Dame fans. They will do this with a one or all of the top four Irish hating phrases in our college football […]

items.title: Should Notre Dame schedule North Dakota State on future football schedules?
items.summary: One of the more fun tidbits of news from the last few days is that the North Dakota State Bison are moving from the FCS to the Mountain West Conference in the FBS. After decades of being the most dominant team in the FCS, it makes perfect sense for NDSU to make this move, and […]

items.title: Notre Dame 2026 NFL Draft prospects: Fighting Irish fans answer questions
items.summary: The Notre Dame Fighting Irish haven’t played football since November 29th, but with the Super Bowl over, the NFL is gearing up for the 2026 offseason including the 2026 NFL Draft. With several former Notre Dame players expected to be drafted this year, we are hosting a Q&A with the NFL fans around SB Nation’s […]
